message.content:
cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI

Reasoning: 
- cs.RO (Robotics): The paper focuses on developing a system for indoor localization and tracking of a robot using sensors such as IMU and magnetometer. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a closed-loop system for localization and tracking, which involves both Front-end and Backend optimization. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): Although not explicitly mentioned, the paper may involve some computer vision techniques for processing the sensor data. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper uses a probabilistic IMU motion model and sequential Monte-Carlo technique for tracking the robot trajectory. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper involves developing an algorithm for globally localizing and tracking a robot with a priori unknown location, given an informative prior map of BLE beacons.
